requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.0 (Cheetah)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9600
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 (El Capitn)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
